content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PMC FAQ is available for every EPAM employee in “Help” tab even if employee is not logged in to PMC:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e5d19331-ee5e-42ee-aa22-c7a831cf6f94/image2014-10-24%2011:9:6.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":390,\"height\":228}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PMC FAQ is grouped into categories and contains answers to the most frequent questions related to PMC Suite Applications. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
